indicator_name: Number of persons convicted of offences against public office, including corruption and bribery
graph_title: Number of persons convicted of offences against public office, including corruption and bribery
goal_name: 16. Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
target_name: 16.5 Substantially reduce corruption and bribery in all their forms
indicator_name1: 16.5.1.2 Number of persons convicted of offences against public office, including corruption and bribery
organization_name: The State Penitentiary Service under the Government of the Kyrgyz Republic (GSIN)
definitions: The number of people convicted of official crimes, including corruption and bribery, makes it possible to identify the level of crime detection by law enforcement agencies of the Kyrgyz Republic, as well as the level of corruption in state executive authorities and local self-government bodies.
concepts: An indicator of the number of persons against whom the judicial authorities of the Kyrgyz Republic have issued convictions (which have entered into force) in accordance with Chapter 44. Corruption and other crimes against the interests of the state and municipal service of the Criminal Code of the Kyrgyz Republic
rationale_interpretation: The goal is to ensure access to justice for all and to create effective, accountable and participatory institutions at all levels.
data_sources: The data sources are subordinate institutions of the State Penitentiary Service (personal files of convicts)
data_collection: Data collection from the institutions of the State Penitentiary Service is carried out on the basis of the reporting form approved by the order of the State Penitentiary Service "On Approval of the reporting Form" dated August 11, 2016
computation_methods: Data on the number of persons convicted of official crimes, including corruption and bribery, is collected at the end of the reporting period (year) from the personal files of those convicted in subordinate institutions of the State Penitentiary Service.
comments_limitations: They are provided by subordinate institutions of the State Penitentiary Service
quality_assurance: Data on the number of persons convicted of official crimes, including corruption and bribery, are formed on the basis of verdicts and decisions of judicial authorities of the Kyrgyz Republic.
data_availability_gaps: Data on the number of people convicted of official crimes, including corruption and bribery, are available based on official requests.
disaggregation: On the deployment of institutions of the State Penitentiary Service
international_comparability: The methodology complies with international standards
references_documentation: The National SDG Reporting Platform of the Kyrgyz Republic: https://sustainabledevelopment-kyrgyzstan .github.io
